title: Stuck in Authenticating
body:
As the title suggest I´m stuck in Authenticating. I´ve tried Full repair but didnt work
Any suggestions?

Ty

replies.body: Most of the time this kind of issue means that something is blocking your network from being able to make a solid link with our login servers. Double check your network settings using this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for steps on how you can setup port forwarding and flush your DNS, but also make sure you check for any firewalls that might be blocking your connection!

I'm having the same issue at the moment. You're not alone.

Please let me know if you find a fix. {{champion:83}}
